articles.title: Xbox Series X and Game Pass Are About to Get A Little More Expensive - IGN
articles.description: The head of communications at Xbox told The Verge today that the company is increasing the price of the Xbox Series X and Game Pass.
articles.content:
Microsoft is about to increase the price of the Xbox Series X and Game Pass, The Verge reports.

articles.title: Look: See Mars and Venus on the Summer Solstice - Inverse
articles.description: Usually the summer solstice is all about Earth and the Sun, but Mars, Venus, and the Moon are getting in on the action this year.
articles.content:
The Summer Solstice is one of the biggest celestial events of the year and a major turning point in the calendar, but theres usually not much to see in the sky. 
This year is different.

articles.title: Injury prevents Ras mutant cell expansion in mosaic skin - Nature.com
articles.description: Following skin injury, wild-type epithelial cells outcompete oncogenic Ras G12V mutant cells owing to differential activation of the EGFR signalling pathway during injury repair.
